oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Country Music Month promos - various artists - 1971-09-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of various country music month and CMA award radio spots featuring Tennessee Ernie Ford, Loretta Lynn, Marty Robbins, Jerry Reed, Danny Davis, Tompall Glaser, Merle Haggard, Bob Luman, Ray Pillow, Tommy Overstreet, Bud Brewer, Charlie Walker, Becki Bluefield, Glen Campbell, Little Jimmy Dickens, and the Sunshine Whistle Band, recorded on September 15, 1971.
